text: aur ai meree qaum tum apanee jagah (jo chaaho) karo main bhee (bajae khud) kuchh karata hoo anaqareeb hee tumhen maaloom ho jaega ki kis par azaab naazil hota hai ja usako (logon kee nazaron mein) rusava kar dega aur (ye bhee maaloom ho jaega ki) kaun jhootha hai tum bhee muntizar raho main bhee tumhaare saath intezaar karata hoon
